urd-ng-102-174502-11516107-post11__2
for instance if someone goes to steal and realizes at that moment theft is not a good thing its curse it entails punishment they are also afraid of god would example when thief attempts time he gets feeling involves fears then will commit sets out but in be punished wont bad habit brings the wrath this realization serve as an effective deterrent him proceed with his plan perform crime just before commits wrong do robbing sin punishable so lord something stealing bring allah person thought there from human robs place danger rob same tomorrow well man intends fear on object still until believes who
For instance, if someone goes to steal and realizes at that moment that "theft is not a good thing and it's a curse, it entails punishment and they are also afraid of God," they would not steal.
for instance if someone goes to steal and realizes at that moment that theft is not a good thing and its a curse it entails punishment and they are also afraid of god they would not steal

For instance, when a thief sets out to commit a theft but realizes in time that 'theft is not good; it is a curse; he will be punished and he also fears God', then he won't commit theft.

For example, if a thief realizes that theft is a bad habit and a curse, and that it brings punishment and the wrath of God, then this realization will serve as an effective deterrent for him, and he will not proceed with his plan of theft.

a21xirv18up71h
For example if a thief goes to perform a crime but just before he commits it he realizes that its a wrong thing to do and that robbing is a sin and that it is punishable so if he fears his Lord he will then not commit the crime.
for example if a thief goes to perform a crime but just before he commits it he realizes that its a wrong thing to do and that robbing is a sin and that it is punishable so if he fears his lord he will then not commit the crime

If a thief robs a place, then he is in danger to rob the same place and same time tomorrow as well. If he fears god and man, he will not steal.

for instance when a thief goes to steal something if he realizes at that time that stealing is wrong that it is a curse and it will bring punishment and he fears allah then that person will not steal

a6tw9zegog7ph
For instance, when a thief goes to steal something, if he realizes at that time that stealing is wrong, it is a curse and it will bring punishment, and he fears Allah, that person will not steal.
for instance when a thief goes to steal something if he realizes at that time that stealing is wrong it is a curse and it will bring punishment and he fears allah that person will not steal

a1wrvfwizbd6rc
For example, a thief will still steal until he believes stealing is a curse and there is punishment for it; until he fears from God, then that Human will steal.
for example a thief will still steal until he believes stealing is a curse and there is punishment for it until he fears from god then that human will steal

a6tw9zegog7ph
As an example, when a thief when goes to steal, if he at that time gets a thought that stealing is not a good thing and theft is a curse, there is also punishment in it and he fears from God, then that person will not steal.
as an example when a thief when goes to steal if he at that time gets a thought that stealing is not a good thing and theft is a curse there is also punishment in it and he fears from god then that person will not steal

au2ar4vob7vlv
For example, if a thief who goes to steal gets the thought that stealing is not a good thing and theft is a curse with punishment, then he fears from God and will not steal.
for example if a thief who goes to steal gets the thought that stealing is not a good thing and theft is a curse with punishment then he fears from god and will not steal

amd40d0gc1l4r
If a thief robs a place, then he is in danger to rob the same place and same time tomorrow as well. If he fears god and man, he will not steal.
if a thief robs a place then he is in danger to rob the same place and same time tomorrow as well if he fears god and man he will not steal
